tool_description: This API enhances the display effect of images, transforming blurry images into sharp and enlarging them.
name: Photo Enhance API
title: Photo Enhance API

api_list.name: enhance
api_list.description: This API is Image Enhancement and Enlargement API: Empowering Users to Improve Picture Clarity and Enlarge Images
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://photo-enhance-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/scale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "photo-enhance-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://photo-enhance-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/scale"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "photo-enhance-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
